Class BalloonWorld

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      BalloonWorld

public class BalloonWorld
extends greenfoot.World

A world of balloons. Balloons will be created and flow from the bottom to the top of the screen.

Author:
Poul Henriksen
